name: Drift Prototype
description:
Prototype vehicle controls.

Drive around a debug arena in a Subaru while listening to Eurobeat!

Car model by Bear Interactive
City generation by OliVR
Music by Max Coveri (used without permission for the meme)

Version control
0.0.1 - Car + debug arena prototype
0.1.1 - Added CScape city environment, improvements to handling and physics
0.1.2 - Added boost (left shift), adjusted handling and physics, and added Mac support
